info.title: Digital Bible Platform
info.description: Fast, easy, and free API access to video, audio, and text Bibles.

get.summary: Returns Bible Filesets which have audio timestamps
get.description: This call returns a list of fileset that have timestamp metadata associated with them. This data could be used to search audio bibles for a specific term, make karaoke verse & audio readings, or to jump to a specific location in an audio file.

get.summary: Returns audio timestamps for a chapter
get.description: This route will return timestamps for a chapter. Note that the fileset id must be available via the path `/timestamps`. At first, only a few filesets may have timestamps metadata applied.

parameters.name: fileset_id
parameters.description: The specific fileset to return references for

parameters.name: book
parameters.description: The Book ID for which to return timestamps. For a complete list see the `book_id` field in the `/bibles/books` route.

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: The chapter for which to return timestamps

get.summary: Returns content for a single fileset, book and chapter
get.description: For a given fileset, book and chapter, return content (text, audio or video)

parameters.name: fileset_id
parameters.description: The fileset ID

parameters.name: book
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given book. For a complete list see the `book_id` field in the `/bibles/books` route.

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given chapter

parameters.name: verse_start
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given starting verse

parameters.name: verse_end
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given ending verse

get.summary: Available fileset types
get.description: A list of all the file types that exist within the filesets

get.summary: Download specific fileset
get.description: For a given fileset return content (text, audio or video)

parameters.name: fileset_id
parameters.description: The fileset ID

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given book. For a complete list see the `book_id` field in the `/bibles/books` route.

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given chapter

get.summary: List of filesets which can be downloaded for this API key
get.description: List of filesets which can be downloaded for this API key

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of search results to return

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current page of the results

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by type of content (audio, video, text)

get.summary: Returns Bibles Verses based on filter criteria
get.description: The base bible route returning by default bibles and filesets that your key has access to

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: The book to filter bible_verses by

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: The chapter to filter bible_verses by

parameters.name: verse_number
parameters.description: The verse start to filter bible_verses by

get.summary: Returns Bibles Verses based on filter criteria
get.description: The base bible route returning by default bibles and filesets that your key has access to

parameters.name: bible_id
parameters.description: The Bible ID to filter bible_verses by

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: The book to filter bible_verses by

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: The chapter to filter bible_verses by

parameters.name: verse_number
parameters.description: The verse start to filter bible_verses by

get.summary: Returns Bibles based on filter criteria
get.description: The base bible route returning by default bibles and filesets that your key has access to

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: The iso code to filter results by. This will return results only in the language specified. For a complete list see the `iso` field in the `/languages` route

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Will filter bibles based upon the media type of their filesets

parameters.name: media_exclude
parameters.description: Will exclude bibles based upon the media type of their filesets

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The iso code to filter results by. This will return results only in the language specified. For a complete list see the `iso` field in the `/country` route

parameters.name: audio_timing
parameters.description: This will return results only which have audio timing information available for that bible. The timing information is stored in table bible_file_timestamps.

get.summary: Returns metadata for all bibles meeting the search_text in it's name
get.description: metadata for all bibles meeting the search_text in it's name

get.summary: Returns metadata for all bibles meeting the given version in it's Bible ID
get.description: metadata for all bibles meeting the version in it's Bible ID

get.summary: Returns detailed metadata for a single Bible
get.description: Detailed information for a single Bible

get.summary: Book information for a Bible
get.description: Returns a list of translated book names and general information for the given Bible. The actual list of books may vary from fileset to fileset. For example, a King James Fileset may contain deuterocanonical books that are missing from one of it's sibling filesets nested within the bible parent.

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: The book id. For a complete list see the `book_id` field in the `/bibles/books` route.

parameters.name: verify_content
parameters.description: Filter all the books that have content

parameters.name: verse_count
parameters.description: Retrieve how many verses the chapters of the books have

get.summary: Default Bible for a language
get.description: Returns default Bible for a language

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: The language code to filter results by

get.summary: Bible Copyright information
get.description: All bible fileset's copyright information and organizational connections

parameters.name: bible_id
parameters.description: The Bible ID to retrieve the copyright information for

parameters.name: iso
parameters.description: The iso code to filter organization translations by. For a complete list see the `iso` field in the `/languages` route.

get.summary: Returns Signed URLs or Text
get.description: V4's base fileset route

parameters.name: fileset_id
parameters.description: The Bible fileset ID

parameters.name: book
parameters.description: The Book ID. For a complete list see the `book_id` field in the `/bibles/books` route.

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: The chapter number

get.summary: Search a bible for a word

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The word or phrase being searched

parameters.name: fileset_id
parameters.description: The Bible fileset ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of search results to return

parameters.name: books
parameters.description: The usfm book ids to search through separated by a comma

get.summary: Returns detailed metadata for a single Bible arclight
get.description: Returns detailed metadata for a single Bible arclight

get.summary: Download annotations for specific user and bible fileset
get.description: For a given fileset return content (text, audio or video)

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The User ID

parameters.name: bible_id
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given bible

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given book. For a complete list see the `book_id` field in the `/bibles/books` route.

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: Will filter the results by the given chapter

parameters.name: notes_sort_by
parameters.description: The field to sort by for the notes

parameters.name: bookmarks_sort_by
parameters.description: The field to sort by for the bookmarks

parameters.name: highlights_sort_by
parameters.description: The field to sort by for the highlights

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: The direction to sort by

get.summary: Returns Alphabets
get.description: Returns a list of the world's known scripts. This route might be useful to you if you'd like to query information about fonts, alphabets, and the world's writing systems. Some fileset returns may not display correctly without a font delivered by these via the `alphabets/{script_id}` routes.

get.summary: Return details on a single Alphabet
get.description: Returns a single alphabet along with whatever bibles and languages using it.

parameters.name: script_id
parameters.description: The alphabet Script, which is used as the identifier

get.summary: Returns Countries
get.description: Returns the List of Countries

parameters.name: l10n
parameters.description: When set to a valid three letter language iso, the returning results will be localized in the language matching that iso. (If an applicable translation exists). For a complete list see the `iso` field in the `/languages` route

parameters.name: include_languages
parameters.description: When set to true, the return will include the major languages used in each country.

get.summary: Returns Countries
get.description: Returns the List of Countries filtered by names

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search countries by name

get.summary: Returns details for a single Country
get.description: Returns details for a single Country

externalDocs.description: For more information on Country Codes,  please refer to the ISO Registration Authority

get.summary: Returns Languages
get.description: Returns the List of Languages

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO Country Code. For a complete list of Country codes,  please refer to the ISO Registration Authority. https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: The iso code to filter languages by. For a complete list see the `iso` field in the `/languages` route

parameters.name: language_name
parameters.description: The language_name field will filter results by a specific language name

parameters.name: include_translations
parameters.description: Include the ISO language ids for available translations

get.summary: Returns languages related to this search
get.description: Returns paginated languages that have search text in its name or country

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The language text to search by

get.summary: Returns details on a single Language
get.description: Returns details on a single Language

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The language ID

get.summary: Return a range of vernacular numbers
get.description: This route returns the vernacular numbers for a set range.

parameters.name: script_id
parameters.description: The script_id to return numbers for

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start of the range to select for

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end of the range to select for

get.summary: Return all Alphabets that have a custom number sets
get.description: Returns a range of numbers

get.summary: Return a single custom number set
get.description: Returns a range of numbers

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The NumeralSystem id

v4_bible_timestamps.title: Bible Timestamps
v4_bible_timestamps.description: The bibles hash returned for timestamps

v4_plan_index_user.description: The user who created the plan

v4_playlist_index_user.description: The user who created the playlist

v4_languages.all.description:
Display a listing of the resource.
     *                 Fetches the records from the database > passes them through fractal for transforming.

id.title: id
id.description: The Archivist created Bible ID string. This will be between six and twelve letters usually starting with the iso639-3 code and ending with the acronym for the Bible

date.title: date
date.description: The year the Bible was originally published

derived.title: derived
derived.description: This field indicates the Bible from which the current Scriptures being described are derived.

copyright.title: copyright
copyright.description: A short copyright description for the bible text.

versification.title: versification
versification.description: The versification system for ordering books and chapters

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: The timestamp at which the bible was originally created

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The timestamp at which the bible was last updated

BibleBook.title: Bible Book
BibleBook.description: The Bible Book Model stores the vernacular book titles and chapters

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the book in the language of the bible

name_short.title: name_short
name_short.description: If the vernacular name has an abbreviated form, it will be stored hre

chapters.title: chapters
chapters.description: A string of the chapters in the book separated by a comma

book_seq.title: book_seq
book_seq.description:
The ordering provided by the licensor in the USX file, this column
     *                  would likely populated for audio and video where there is no text

BibleFile.title: BibleFile
BibleFile.description: The Bible File Model communicates information about biblical files stored in S3

id.title: id
id.description: The id

verse_sequence.title: verse_sequence
verse_sequence.description: The starting verse for the bible file but with format = integer

chapter_end.title: chapter_end
chapter_end.description: If the Bible File spans multiple chapters this field indicates the last chapter of the selection

verse_start.title: verse_start
verse_start.description: The starting verse at which the BibleFile reference begins

verse_end.title: verse_end
verse_end.description: If the Bible File spans multiple verses this value will indicate the last verse in that reference. This value is inclusive, so for the reference John 1:1-4. The value would be 4 and the reference would contain verse 4.

verse_text.title: verse_text
verse_text.description: If the BibleFile model returns text instead of a file_name this field will contain it.
verse_text.example: And God said unto Abraham, And as for thee, thou shalt keep my covenant, thou, and thy seed after thee throughout their generations.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: If the file has a set length of time, this field indicates that time in milliseconds

BibleFileTimestamp.title: Bible File Timestamp
BibleFileTimestamp.description: The Bible File Timestamp tag model partitions the file into verse by verse sections

id.title: file_id
id.description: The incrementing id of the file timestamp

verse_start.title: verse_start
verse_start.description: The starting verse for the file timestamp

verse_end.title: verse_end
verse_end.description: The ending verse for the file timestamp

verse_sequence.title: verse_sequence
verse_sequence.description: The starting verse for the bible file but with format = integer

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: The time (in seconds) represented by the timestamp

id.title: id
id.description: The fileset id

BibleFilesetSize.title: BibleFilesetSize
BibleFilesetSize.description: The Bible fileset size model communicates information about generalized fileset sizes

id.title: id
id.description: The id

BibleFilesetType.title: Bible Fileset Type
BibleFilesetType.description: The Bible Fileset Type model communicates general metadata about the bible_filesets.set_size_code

set_type_code.title: set_type_code
set_type_code.description: The set_type_code indicating the type of the fileset

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the fileset type

type.title: type
type.description: The type of link, for example, web, pdf, print

provider.title: provider
provider.description: Organization providing the content referenced in the link

vernacular.title: vernacular
vernacular.example: La Palabra De Dios Para Todos

name.title: name
name.example: The Word of God for All 2014

description.title: description
description.example: Aguaruna is an indigenous American language of the Jivaroan family...

BibleVerse.title: BibleVerse
BibleVerse.description: The BibleVerse model stores the unformatted Bible Text for searching & JSON returned verses

id.title: id
id.description: The incrementing id for the Bible Verse

verse_text.title: verse_text
verse_text.description: The text of the Bible Verse

Book.title: Book
Book.description: The Book model communicates information about the canonical books of the Bible

id.title: id
id.description: The USFM 2.4 id for the books of the Bible

id_usfx.title: id_usfx
id_usfx.description: The usfx id for the books of the Bible

id_osis.title: id_osis
id_osis.description: The OSIS id for the books of the Bible

protestant_order.title: protestant_order
protestant_order.description: The standard book order for the `protestant_order` in ascending order from Genesis onwards

testament_order.title: testament_order
testament_order.description: The standard book order within a testament in ascending order from Genesis to Malachi, and Matthew to Revelations

book_testament.title: book_testament
book_testament.description: A short code identifying the testament containing the book

book_group.title: book_group
book_group.description: An english name for the section of books that current book can be categorized in

name.title: name
name.description: The English name of the book

notes.title: notes
notes.description: Any archivist notes about the book

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: The timestamp for the books creation

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The timestamp for the last update of the book

name.title: name
name.description: The translated name of the biblical book

name_long.title: name_long
name_long.description: The long form of the translated name

name_short.title: name_short
name_short.description: The short form of the translated name

name_abbreviation.title: name_abbreviation
name_abbreviation.description: The abbreviated form of the translated name

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: The timestamp that the translated name was originally created

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The timestamp that the translated name was last updated

id.title: id
id.description: The unique ID for the commentary, for example the English Treasure of Scripture Knowledge id is ENGTSK

type.title: type
type.description: The genre of commentary being described

date.title: date
date.description: The year the commentary was published

features.title: date
features.description: The year the commentary was published

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: The original publisher of the commentary

id.title: id
id.description: Strongs id for the lexical entry

base_word.title: base_word
base_word.description: The Greek or Hebrew word being defined

Video.title: VideoTranslations
Video.description: The Video model holds information about biblical films. It serves as a wrapper for all Video{Value} Models including VideoTags and VideoTranslations.

VideoTag.title: VideoTags
VideoTag.description: The VideoTags model holds miscellaneous information about the video model.

id.title: id
id.description: The incrementing id of the video tag

id.title: Country Iso 3166-1
id.description: The Country ID for the country aligning with the ISO 3166-1 standard

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the Iso Registration Authority

iso_a3.title: Country Iso 3166-3
iso_a3.description: The Country iso for the country aligning with the ISO 3166-3 standard

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the Iso Wiki

fips.title: FIPS ID
fips.description: The Country id for the country aligning with the FIPS standard of the United Nations

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the FIPS Wiki

continent.title: continent ID
continent.description: The continent code for the country

name.title: Country Name
name.description: The name for the country in English

introduction.title: Country introduction
introduction.description: A brief description of the country in English
introduction.example: The landlocked Principality of Andorra is one of the smallest states in Europe, nestled high in the Pyrenees...

script.title: Alphabet Script
script.description: The Script ID for the alphabet aligning with the iso 15924 standard

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the Unicode Consortium

name.title: Alphabet Name
name.description: The name of the alphabet in English

unicode_pdf.title: Unicode PDF
unicode_pdf.description: A url to a reference PDF for the alphabet

family.title: Family
family.description: The linguistic family the alphabet can be categorized within

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of alphabet be described

white_space.title: White Space
white_space.description: The usage white space within the alphabet

open_type_tag.title: Open Type Tag
open_type_tag.description: The open type tag of the alphabet

complex_positioning.title: Open Type Tag
complex_positioning.description: The open type tag of the alphabet

requires_font.title: Requires Font
requires_font.description: If the Alphabet generally requires the use of a font to display correctly online

unicode.title: Unicode
unicode.description: If the Alphabet is fully supported by the unicode spec

contextual_forms.title: Contextual Forms
contextual_forms.description: If the Alphabet contains contextual forms

case.title: Case
case.description: If the Alphabet utilizes different cases

split_graphs.title: Split Graphs
split_graphs.description: If the Alphabet contains letters that are written using two separate distinct elements.

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the Script Source Feature Definitions
For more info please refer to the Script Source Feature Definitions

baseline.title: Baseline
baseline.description: The alignment of the text within the alphabet

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the Script Source Feature Definitions

ligatures.title: Ligatures
ligatures.description: Indicates on if letters may be or are required to be joined as a single glyph

externalDocs.description: For more information please refer to the Script Source Feature Definitions

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: The direction that the alphabet is read

externalDocs.description: For more information please refer to the Script Source Feature Definitions

sample.title: Sample Image
sample.description: A sample section of text for the alphabet

sample_img.title: Sample Image
sample_img.description: A url to an image of the sample section of text for the alphabet

id.title: Alphabet Font ID
id.description: The incrementing numeric id for the alphabet fonts

font_filename.title: Alphabet Font File Name
font_filename.description: The File name for the font

copyright.title: Alphabet copyright
copyright.description: The copyright of the font if any

url.title: Alphabet URL
url.description: The url to the font file

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any notes for the font file name

italic.title: Italic
italic.description: Determines if the font file contains or supports italics

id.title: id
id.description: The incrementing ID for the language

glotto_id.title: glotto_id
glotto_id.description: The glottolog ID for the language

externalDocs.description: For more info please refer to the Glottolog

maps.title: Maps
maps.description: The general area where the language can be found

development.title: Development
development.description: The development of the growth of the language

area.title: Area
area.example: Central, south; Canary Islands. Also in Andorra, ...

population.title: Population
population.description: The estimated number of people that speak the language

population_notes.title: Population Notes
population_notes.description: Any notes regarding the estimated number of people
population_notes.example: 58,200,000 in United Kingdom (Crystal 2003). Population total all countries: 334,800,758.

notes.title: Notes
notes.example: The Aragonese dialect of Spanish is different from Aragonese language [arg]. Christian.

typology.title: Typology
typology.example: SVO,prepositions,genitives, relatives after noun heads,articles, numerals before noun heads...

country_id.title: country_id
country_id.description: The primary country where the language is spoken

user_id.description: The user id for the user who has the account being described

provider_id.title: provider_id
provider_id.description: The social account provider that the user has logged in with

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: The Profile model communicates information about a user

sex.title: The Gender of the User
sex.description: This field aligns with the ISO/IEC 5218 Standard. Codes for the representation of human sexes is an international standard that defines a representation of human sexes through a language-neutral single-digit code.

administrative_area.title: Administrative Area
administrative_area.description: State / Province / Region (ISO code when available)

id.title: id
id.description: The unique id for the project

url_avatar.title: url_avatar
url_avatar.description: The url to the logo / main identifying image for the project

url_avatar_icon.title: url_avatar_icon
url_avatar_icon.description: The url to the logo / main identifying image for the project in a form that is suitable for small images (less than 100 pixels)

url_site.title: url_site
url_site.description: The url to the site that is currently making use of the API

reset_path.title: reset_path
reset_path.description: The url to the location that contains the password reset form. Note this should end with a / and expect the final url path item to be a token. Example: https://example.com/password/reset/ with the expectation of receiving https://example.com/password/reset/{TOKEN_ID}

description.title: description
description.description: The description of the project and it's goals

deleted_at.title: description
deleted_at.description: The day the project was soft deleted

created_at.description: The day the project was added to the api

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The day the project was last updated

id.title: id
id.description: The highlight id

user_id.title: user_id
user_id.description: The user that created the highlight

highlighted_color.title: highlighted_color
highlighted_color.description: The highlight's highlighted color in either hex, rgb, or rgba notation.

highlight_start.title: highlight_start
highlight_start.description: The number of words from the beginning of the verse to start the highlight at. For example, if the verse Genesis 1:1 had a `highlight_start` of 4 and a highlighted_words equal to 2. The result would be: In the beginning `[God created]` the heavens and the earth.

highlighted_words.title: highlighted_words
highlighted_words.description: The number of words being highlighted. For example, if the verse Genesis 1:1 had a `highlight_start` of 4 and a highlighted_words equal to 2. The result would be: In the beginning `[God created]` the heavens and the earth.

verse_text.title: verse_text
verse_text.description: The text of the Bible Verse

id.description: The unique incrementing id for each NoteTag

reference_id.description: The unique incrementing id for each NoteTag

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The timestamp the Note was last updated at
